Reviews.Content: not good. Bathrooms dirty.No toilet paper for over 24 hrs. Don't mind basic - but when bathrooms dirty and no loo-rolls for over 24hrs , not acceptable. Nobody on the desk except to sign you in ,so no one to complain to . Shower in room but didn't work. Charging the same as far better pensionnes in same area.
Reviews.Author: florenceSouthampton
